Four case studies include:

KACHD (high tide/low DO)
MARMB (low tide/low DO)
PDDBY (high tide/high DO)
WKBFR (low tide/high DO)

Chosen based on geographic distribution, mean air-sea gas exchange, and relative amounts of anomolous values

.RData files are:

XXXXX_intgrd_td - interpolation grid for a site using regressoin w/ tide
XXXXX_intgrd_dtd - interpolatiion grid for a site using regression with tidal derivative
XXXXX_prdnrm_td - predicted/normalized results using tidal regression
XXXXX_prdnrm_dtd - predicted/normalized results using tidal derivative
met_ls_td - metabolism estimates for all sites using tidal regression
met_ls_dtd - metabolism estimates for all sites using tidal derivative
site_sel - data for creating plot to select sites, all SWMP sites
